data.name: Arrival of the Punnu Demo
data.detailed_description:
Arrival of Punnu is a story about Punnu from outer space, explorers who make a crash landing to a planet called Earth.
In their mission to fix their broken ship they get an ally of a little child, whose imagination
will open up a whole new perspective to our homeplanet.

Arrival of Punnu is an emotional adventure, where the playground are the different cultures and diverse wonders
of nature on our homeworld.

This demo includes the beginning of this adventure.

Soundtrack composed by Erik Nyholm
